Standard.Name: The Treasure of Hassan Ben Sahid 1.1.2.1.1

English.Text: It's a bit of a wrestling match. "How do you like that eh, sirrah!" blares your punchiest officer, emerging from the fight the victor, his adversary left gasping and bloody-nosed on the marble floor. "What do you think you are doing!" rages the proprietor of these fabulously frescoed baths, "this is a place of peace you have defiled!" So much for relaxing shore leave...
